messages.message: Is it possible to make links clickable in the source docs in Converse/Chatbot? I'd love for the option to open up links (including in-document links to other sections) from the referenced documents to navigate them easier.
Related to this, have we gotten any customer feedback around ease of verifying the source information

The idea of opening links is interesting. Is this feature request coming from best practices or customer pain?

Wondering if there's three levels of 'link ixd'
• hover - preview card
• click 1 - modal preview
• click 2 - full screen / new page

It's not from a customer pain, but I can anticipate it being one once we start to have more conversations. Especially in nested documents, like our Global Handbook that links out to other documents for more info, users would have to look for them themselves in their own file system to verify the information.
do we a list of 'customer pain'
